means: 密克罗尼西亚（西太平洋岛群，意为“小岛群岛”）

sentence.Network_en: A large rust - colored gorgonian sea fan perches against a reef in Micronesia.
sentence.Network_cn: 珊瑚暗礁图集.一个巨大铁锈色可怕的海扇栖息在珊瑚礁在密克罗尼西亚群岛.

sentence.Network_en: The islands of Melanesia, Micronesia and Polynesia.
sentence.Network_cn: 夏威夷以东南的密克罗尼西亚中的一组岛屿.

sentence.Network_en: Habitat wind township and village roads panacea , Micronesia, as beads Network, to facilitate passenger and freight.
sentence.Network_cn: 境风乡、镇、村皆通公路, 密如珠网, 客货运便利.

PerfectNetExp.abs: THE IMPACT OF HUMAN ACTIVITIES ON MANGROVE COAST OF KOSRAE ISLAND, THE FEDERATED STATES OF MICRONESIA人类活动对密克罗尼西亚联邦库赛埃岛红树林海岸的影响

means.word_mean: 1. a country scattered over Micronesia with a constitutional government in free association with the United States; achieved independence in 1986
2. the islands in the northwestern part of Oceania

auth_sentence.content: Marshall Islands withdraw from the Congress of Micronesia seeking greater political independence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Marshall Islands withdraw from the Congress of Micronesia seeking greater political independence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Marshall Islands withdraw from the Congress of Micronesia seeking greater political independence.

auth_sentence.content: It includes a commitment to protect nearly a third of coastal waters and a fifth of the land area of Micronesia.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It includes a commitment to protect nearly a third of coastal waters and a fifth of the land area of Micronesia.

auth_sentence.content: US government sets up the Congress of Micronesia in preparation for greater self-governance in Micronesia.
